Name: Musical instrument
Description: A Musical instrument is a device constructed or modified with the purpose of making music. In principle, anything that produces sound, and can somehow be controlled by a musician, can serve as a musical instrument. (See e.g. the hardart.) A Musical instrument is also always a Musical Performance Role, so that a Musical Artist can easily be credited with playing the instrument in a performance.Instruments are arranged in a sort of family tree, though it need not be a strict hierarchy.

Properties.Name: Family
Properties.Description: The family of instruments to which this one belongs
